program codeforces_387_A

  implicit none

  character(len=5) :: s,t
  integer :: xh, xm, yh, ym
  integer :: total, new_h, new_m
  integer :: pos, xh_str_length, xm_str_count
  ! read the two time strings
  read(*,*) s,t

  ! process first time s
  pos = index(s,':')
  if ( pos == 0 ) then
     write(*,*) "Invalid input: No colon in first time"
     stop
  end if
  xh_str_length = pos-1
  ! read hour part
  read(s(1:pos-1),*) xh
  ! read minute part
  read(s(pos+1:),*) xm

  ! process second time t
  pos = index(t,':')
  if ( pos ==0 ) then
     write(*,*) "Invalid input: No colon in second time"
     stop
  endif
  read(t(1:pos-1),*) yh
  read(t(pos+1:),*) ym

  ! compute total difference
  total = (xh*60 + xm) - (yh*60 + ym )
  total = modulo( total, 1440 )

  new_h = total /60
  new_m = total - new_h *60  ! mod is same as modulo here since it is >=0.

  ! output
  write(*, '(i2.2,a1,i2.2)') new_h, ':', new_m

end program codeforces_387_a

The code:

program codeforces_387_A
  implicit none

  character(len=5) :: s, t
  integer :: xh, xm, yh, ym
  integer :: total, new_h, new_m
  integer :: pos

  read(*,*) s, t

  ! Process first time (s)
  pos = index(s, ':')
  if (pos == 0 .or. pos == 1 .or. pos == len(s)) then
     write(*,*) "Invalid input format for first time"
     stop
  end if
  read(s(1:pos-1),*) xh
  read(s(pos+1:),*) xm

  ! Process second time (t)
  pos = index(t, ':')
  if (pos == 0 .or. pos ==1 .or. pos == len(t)) then
     write(*,*) "Invalid input format for second time"
     stop
  end if
  read(t(1:pos-1),*) yh
  read(t(pos+1:),*) ym

  ! Compute difference
  total = (xh *60 + xm) - (yh *60 + ym)
  total = modulo(total, 1440)

  new_h = total /60
  new_m = modulo(total, 60)

  ! Output
  write(*, '(i2.2, ":", i2.2)') new_h, new_m

end program codeforces_387_A
